name: The Oddity
description:
Welcome to The Oddity! A funky little bar tucked away in a mountainous area of another dimension. No matter how many horns, scales, or claws you have, everyone is welcome at The Oddity!

It’s your first day on the job, and you’ve arrived just in time to start cleaning up after last nights crowd. Pretty simple, right? All you have to do is find all the bottles around the bar, and throw them into the dumpster around the back.

-

Controls

W, A, S and D to walk around.

Left Click to interact with objects.

-

The Oddity is a short, first-person puzzle game I made in my first year of university.

All the 3D models are made by myself.
